name: Baseball Simulator
description:
Batter up! Here's an awesome, easy to play baseball game for you to play. It's called baseball Simulator and it's here for you to SWING into action. 

(hint: To actually play the game, 

1. Click on start.

2. Click on the Fullscreen button on the bottom right corner of your screen to maximize gameplay. (optional, but recommended for best experience! 

4. Press the spacebar with correct timing to score points!

(You only have 60 seconds to play and get a high score. Once the game is over, just click the reset button to play again. (Majority rules)

This game was created by me using construct 3. Please, under any circumstances, don't copy the game and sell it.
